direction.raw_text: - DAY 2 As LAWSON awakes with a start. He's late 30's, a little worn. He shakes his WIFE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Unnn...sounds like... (STIFLING YAWN) .the garbage men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On Tuesday?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe they changed the schedule... Lawson listens to the noise as it APPROACHES, finally throws his feet into his bedroom slippers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: TRY 3 He runs into the pantry, dragging several ungainly plastic trash bags.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LAWSON'S HOUSE - DAY 4 The truck SOUND is CLOSER now. We can SEE it at the end of the long driveway. Lawson flings the green plastic bags into two battered and half-full metal cans, starts running down the driveway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait a minute, wait a minute!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY 5 The truck stops at the bottom of the driveway. Lawson stumbles his way towards it, smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was afraid you'd miss me -- REVERSE ANGLE 6
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The man behind the truck -- pulls an Ingram submachine gun INTO VIEW. At the same moment, the cab of the garbage truck is kicked open and DIAZ, the driver, leans out, similarly armed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry-we won't. And they cut Lawson down, the bullets raking across his body and the cans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lawson falls back, spread-eagled. The garbage cans, pierced and leaking, roll TOWARD THE CAMERA, blocking our view just as Cooke moves close to administer a coup de grace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: grins INTO THE CAMERA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You ain't seen nothin' yet. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: us that Forrestal is just now closing the trunk of a big new Cadillac. He's showing it to Diaz, who nods and makes noncommital NOISES as Forrestal continues the hype.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (as trunk closes) Hear that sound? American workmanship. You think the Japanese invented that? Bullshit We did...sure, we lost it for a while-but we got 'it back. Diaz gets into the car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure, get in...comfy, right? I know what you're gonna say... it's cloth. But take it from me-you don't want leather, it's hot, it cracks, it's trouble. And look at the head room.. .you're not gonna have a problem... Diaz starts the engine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go ahead, start it up. Hear that? That's power-that's performance .that's -- Jesus Christ -- Forrestal has said this last because Diaz has thrown the car into reverse, knocking down a big display.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Diaz slams the car into forward, hits the accelerator and ROARS across the display room floor. The car SLAMS into Forrestal, flinging his body across the hood. The car continues on, CRASHES through the outside window and disappears down the street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FISHING BOAT - NIGHT Dangling working lights illuminate the night. The tuna fleet is in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - CLOSE ON BENNETT mid-thirties, well muscled, BENNETT helps another worker wrestle a net of fish into a hold, then he wipes his brow and shouts over the. noise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's all for me, Les. Les nods. Bennett steps off the boat, crosses over another boat and steps onto his boat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bennett starts his boat, revs the throttle, then pulls away from the other boats. The wind whips his hair as he cruises out into the night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The boat moves away from us, then WHOOM, the boat
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: into a fireball, sending debris high into the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A man comes out of the shadows on the dock and watches the explosion, the fiery lights splashing onto his face. It's Cooke - the "garbage man."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MOUNTAINS - DAY MAIN TITLES BEGIN...and along with them we HEAR MUSIC. The CAMERA SKIMS OVER snow-capped peaks, pine trees twinkling dew in the morning light. Then we SEE it: An 80's version of a log cabin...with crisp, clean lines...energy efficient and snug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as a giant FIGURE descends from the mountains behind the house balancing a giant log on his right shoulder and carrying a chain saw in his left hand. This is COLONEL JOHN ALEXANDER MATRIX. He's in his mid-thirties ...a man of raw power and vitality...and something else: Joy. Joy, and a sense of calm. Matrix reaches a shed behind the cabin. He puts down the log and chain saw, then picks up firewood and begins to SPLIT it with awesome single swipes of an axe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as a shadow comes stealthily alongside the house and begins to slowly and cautiously advance on Matrix.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix doesn't turn or otherwise seem to see the other person...but he reacts to little things:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A TWIG cracks. B. A SQUIRREL scampers away, startled. C. SOME PEBBLES roll away. D. A GATE responds with a faint creak while: E. THE AXEHEAD reflects a dull, indistinct figure approaching Matrix from behind. None of the above escapes matrix's eye...and then, at the last possible second, he WHIRLS and confronts:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 24 s Matrix sweeps up the intruder-his eleven-year-old daughter, JENNY. She laughs as he tickles her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad... Dad... put me down. She tickles him back on his neck and ribs...he laughs, puts her down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I surrender, I surrender. He raises his hands, open, trusting. Instantly she attacks again, then runs like hell as he pursues her,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix's Blazer is parked here. Father and daughter sit across from each other-she has a cone, he has a dish. He uses his spoon to steal some of her flavor and jimmies...he gets away with this twice before she pokes him on the nose with the cone. He wipes ice cream from his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix and Jenny are trout fishing in a beautiful stream. A deer tentatively approaches and matrix and Jenny take food from a knapsack and hold it out for the deer. The deer comes closer, takes the food from them, then licks their hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: shows Jenny karate moves. She tries a move on him and he pretends she's knocked him over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: gives Jenny a piggyback ride over the bridge that crosses the stream, as they head back to the cabin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CABIN - DAY 27 Matrix goes to open the refrigerator in his cabin a stops. Taped to the door is a cutout of a heart: Jenny is peeking at Matrix from around the corner of the kitchen. He sees her, he smiles, and they meet and hug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: LATER - DAY 28 Matrix sits at the table as Jenny serves lunch. The view through the expansive picture window is breathtaking. Matrix leafs through some of Jenny's rock'n'roll magazines.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When I was a boy and rock and roll came to East Germany, the communists said it was subversive... (SLIGHT SMILE) .They were right... (BITES INTO SANDWICH JENNY BROUGHT HIM) .What's in this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't want to know. Suddenly Matrix gets an odd look on his face ...he stands, cocks his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong? He shushes her, puts his hand up to block the sun as he peers through the picture window. Now Jenny -- and the audience -- can SEE what matrix's keen senses have already heard-an approaching aircraft.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: with U.S. Army markings, coming towards the house... then veering off for a landing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You said you wouldn't go away again. You said you were through -- MATRIX I'm not going anywhere. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Promise?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Promise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It lands. Three men get out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is in the lead. He's in his early
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: s, fit, energetic -- and, as we can SEE -- the pilot of the craft. He's wearing rugged Army Class "C's." The two young soldiers with him are HARRIS and JACKSON. They wear BDU's and carry carbines. At a look from Kirby they fan out, and watch the cabin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kirby approaches the cabin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: John, come on out. It's Kirby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (o.s.) I know. Startled, Kirby whirls to see Matrix standing behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Silent and smooth...just like always. He smiles and he and Matrix come together and shake hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I better be. You taught me. He affectionately squeezes Kirby's shoulder. Jenny comes out of the cabin toward the two men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need to talk to your dad, Jenny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No way, Jose. Matrix gives her a sharp look and Jenny grudgingly goes back inside. Kirby and Matrix begin to walk as clouds billow high above the mountaintops around them. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - "COM.MANDO" - 4/22/85 9 32 Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone's killing your men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You gave them new identities...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There must have been a leak. Lawson, Forrestal... Bennett have all been hit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's doing it? X KIRBY You've made enemies all over the X world, John. It could be the Syrians, the South Africans, the Russians-or a terrorist group. (PAUSING) They're gonna find you. Matrix looks toward the cabin. Jenny is watching him through a window. Matrix turns back to Kirby and they begin walking back to the cabin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We were going to make a normal X life here...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You will...I promise. I'm going X into the city to coordinate with the Federal people. In the meantime, Jackson and Harris will stay with you. Matrix looks the two soldiers over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They any good?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Real good... (PAUSING) But not as good as you were.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LATER 37 watches the chopper lift off and fly away. Jenny, subdued, comes out of the cabin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it bad?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not leaving you... if that's what you mean.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then it can't be bad. She smiles. An intense look comes over Matrix's face, then
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In a BLUR, he sweeps up Jenny in his arms just before machine gun fire BLASTS the cabin. The VOLLEY OF FIRING SHATTERS the windows and RIPS OPEN Harris' chest, his blood SPLATTERING against the cabin. .Matrix, still clutching Jenny, DIVES through the door into the cabin and HITS the floor. Jackson CATCHES a round in the shoulder, SPINS to the ground, then crawls through the door after Matrix. The three of them lie on the cabin floor as the FIRING CONTINUES to BLAST AWAY at Harris' body, the rounds
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: into the side of the cabin. Then the firing stops. Silence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How bad you hit?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll make it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got to get my rifle from the shed. Keep an eye out, they'll be coming. You're downwind, the air currents might tip them off. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Downwind?? (looks at Matrix like he's crazy) You think I'll smell them coming?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I did. Matrix and Jenny move low to the floor toward her bedroom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay out of sight, I'll be right back. Jenny goes into her bedroom and Matrix goes out the backdoor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He races to the shed, unlocks it, goes inside to a high-tech cabinet and opens it. Inside is an H&K assault rifle, two big banana clips of ammunition and a Baretta JS pistol. Matrix pulls the weapons out and readies them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jackson peers out the window, sees nothing, then edges back to the floor. Two hands WHIP a garotte around his neck and CHOKE the struggling Jackson to death.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: hears a THUMP and sticks her head out from under her bed to look, but sees nothing. Suddenly, footsteps approach her bedroom door. She pulls her head back under the bed just as two boots enter her bedroom. A knife is attached to one of the boots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix puts the pistol in his waistband and SLAMS home a clip in the rifle. He RACES out of the shed,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to the cabin and OPENS the backdoor. Jackson, garotte still around his neck, falls lifelessly through the door STRAIGHT INTO THE CAMERA. Matrix ducks as Jackson GLANCES off him and CRUMPLES to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CABIN - DAY 42 Matrix, H&K rifle held ready, silently enters, then moves carefully through the cabin. He peers into the den and sees Diaz, one of the men who killed Matrix's men, sitting in a chair, looking at Jenny's
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix steps forward and points his rifle directly at Diaz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is she? Diaz smiles and puts his feet up on a table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mellow out, man. We can't talk business with you waving guns in people's faces. Matrix puts the rifle against Diaz's forehead and COCKS the trigger. The smile vanishes from Diaz's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's safe, Major. Whether she stays that way.is up to you. My people got some business with you... Matrix hears a NOISE outside, glances out the window and sees two vehicles RACING away from the house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .and if you want your kid back, you gotta cooperate. Right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wrong. Matrix levels the H&K and BLASTS Diaz in the chest. Diaz and the chair are JERKED violently backward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix JUMPS out of the cabin and RACES to the BLAZER, its hood up. He checks the engine. Torn wires stick up, the distributor cap is disconnected and broken. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont. He looks down the mountain and sees the vehicles winding along the mountain roads. Matrix slams the Blazer's hood...gets inside...puts his weapons on the seat...then releases the brake. Then, one hand on the wheel, the other on the door frame, he begins to push the car. He steers it not towards the dirt road, but towards the shoulder where a steep incline leads downward. Since the Blazer is pointed the wrong way, Matrix is pushing it uphill-the effort is incredible... the veins on his neck stand out...with a SCREAM, he puts everything he's got into it... and finally it begins to roll downwards. Matrix leaps in. Snaps on the driver's shoulder belt... reaches over and wraps the passenger belt around his body as well. The Blazer rolls over the edge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - SEVERAL SHOTS 44 as it bounces wildly down the 45 degree slope.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix fights to control the wheel. A low-hanging branch SMASHES the windshield.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It takes another curve. CAMERA PANS UP, and we SEE the Blazer, coming closer and closer by this direct route.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It barrels down the mountainside, out of control, smashing through trees, bounding off rocks, dropping like a stone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix is taking a terrible beating. But he's almost down to the road...ahead of the black vehicle!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The two vehicles narrowly miss each other-the dark car almost spins out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It careens past the other car, slams into a huge boulder
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: flips -- ROLLS OVER AND OVER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: o.s. of this mishap, rushing down the road.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The wrecked Blazer is BURNING, then suddenly EXPLODES. The CAMERA HOLDS ON this, what looks like Matrix's funeral pyre. Then we SEE movement and SEE a bloodied and injured Matrix crawling away from the intense fire. He stops and looks back at the destroyed Blazer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A large group of armed soldiers start to surround Matrix. He stands up, cut, bleeding. The lead man approaches to frisk him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix ELBOWS him in the stomach, DRIVES his fist into the man's Adam's apple, PULLS HIM DOWN, CRACKS the man's vertebrae, grabs the dead man's rifle and SLAMS the butt against the face on the man closing on him. The man's jaw SHATTERS. But three more men are immediately on Matrix and they wrestle him to the ground. He forces his way up again, the three men still all over him. Matrix's eyes suddenly WIDEN as he looks at two boots with an attached knife, then up at the man standing in them. It's Bennett, the man we saw die!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought you were -- Bennett reaches up with a bulky pistol and points it at Matrix.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dead... He FIRES at point-blank range. Matrix is BLASTED backward to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PORT TERMINAL TRANSPORT BUILDING - DAY Bennett and GENERAL ERNESTO ARIUS (in guerrila fatigues) walk through a large warehouse filled with tanks, jeeps and soldiers carrying bazookas, machine guns, mortars, etc. It looks like a small army.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An intense white light SHIMMERS at the CAMERA, almost as if the light were floating on water. It is so BRIGHT it hurts our eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SMALL ROOM IN PORT TERMINAL TRANSPORT BUILDING - DAY Matrix's motionless body is lying on a slab of a table. His eyes slowly open as he looks at the same BRIGHT LIGHT. That light in on the ceiling of the small room he is lying in. Matrix groggily shakes his head, sits up a little and sees Bennett holding up the bulky gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tranquilizers. General Arius approaches Matrix.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remember me, Major?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I remember the people you tortured and killed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't understand a country like Val Verde, Major. It needs a president with an iron hand. It needs my hand again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why tell me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because you're going to return to Val Verde and kill the president you helped to overthrow me. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you have Bennett do it -- he was there with me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But President Velasquez trusts you; after all, he made you a (IRONIC SMILE) 'Hero of the Revolution...' (SMILE VANISHES) While Captain Bennett, left, shall we say, under a cloud...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (glances at Bennett) He enjoyed the killing a little too much.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You trained me, Major.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can get close to Velasquez, you will kill him...We've gone to alot of trouble to find you. We faked Bennett's death so Kirby would get nervous and lead us to you. And now that I have you, you'll do what I tell you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And if I don't? Arius looks at Matrix for a beat, then Arius nods to Bennett. Bennett opens a sliding door to a closet and matrix sees Jenny. She is gagged and tied tightly to a chair. She is shaking from fear and her eyes are wet with tears. Matrix LUNGES up from the table, but his hands and feet are chained to the table and he is STOPPED. Bennett wheels Jenny out of the closet over to Arius. Arius begins to finger her hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So pretty-There are many things I'm going to teach her. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont.l Matrix FIGHTS at the chains like a crazy man, but he can't move. Arius fingers the shirt collar around her neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You kill Velasquez, Major, and you'll get her back. You try anything else... (PAUSING) .and I'll send her to you in pieces.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: SMALL ROOM IN PORT TERMINAL TRANSPORT BUILDING

direction.raw_text: General Kirby stands in front of the cabin looking at the bodies of Jackson, Harris and Diaz. Soldiers are searching around and inside the cabin. One of the Soldiers approaches Kirby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any sign of Matrix?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No Sir, just those bodies... (PAUSES) .You think there's more?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If he's still alive, I'd expect a lot more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A long, silver limo pulls up to an LAX terminal and parks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cooke is at the wheel. Matrix (in a tropical suit) and Bennett are in the rear seat, SULLY and HENRIQUES on foldout seats facing them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sully will make sure you get on the plane and Henriques will stay with you to make sure you get off. If I don't get a call from either one of them, she's dead. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont. He motions and Henriques opens the car door and brings Matrix out with him. Sully follows them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix looks back at Bennett through the open door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be back, Bennett... For you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be ready. They eye each other, then Sully shuts the door and Matrix watches the limo drive off. Henriques and Sully flank Matrix and they enter the terminal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The three of them pass through the terminal. Matrix looks toward two police officers that are right next to them, but he remains silent. Henriques, Matrix and Sully walk through the X-ray booths as the security guard watches, then they continue on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They approach the boarding gate. Sully hands Henriques and Matrix their tickets, then Sully stuffs a $10.00 bill in Matrix's breast pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have some beers in Val Verde, Matrix, it'll give everyone more time with your daughter. Matrix looks down at the bill, then up at Sully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a nice guy, Sully, I like you... (PAUSING) .That's why I'll kill you last. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - "COMMANDO" - 4/24/85 29 63 Cont. Henriques takes Matrix's arm and moves him toward the gate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Open your mouth again and I'll nail it shut. Matrix looks up at a wall clock. It reads 6:55. He X. and Henriques board the plane as Sully watches from the boarding area.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Henriques and Matrix enter the plane. A STEWARDESS smiles at them and examines their tickets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First class, seats seven A and B. They are the last passengers to be seated. They walk down the aisle, Matrix takes the window seat and Henriques the aisle seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: attracts Matrix's attention and he watches the door to the entrance tunnel CLOSE. The Stewardesses prepare for the takeoff as the plane's engines begin to RUMBLE. Matrix edgily looks around the plane. The Stewardess approaches him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must fasten your seat belt, Sir. Matrix looks out the window and sees Sully looking right back at him through the waiting room window. Matrix turns to the Stewardess.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could I have a blanket and pillow?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure. She takes them down from the upper compartment and hands them to Matrix. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont. The plane is beginning to move. Matrix begins to arrange the blanket and pillow. As soon as the Stewardess moves off, Matrix DELIVERS an incredibly SUDDEN BLOW to Henriques' temple. WHAP! Henriques' eyes roll back in his head, blood trickles out of his mouth, his body goes limp and he falls against Matrix. It's happened so quickly none of the other passengers have noticed it. Matrix throws the blanket over Henriques' body, looks around, then quickly FORCES Henriques' neck down toward his chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Matrix stands and opens the overhead luggage rack. He picks up the blanket covered body and puts it in the overhead rack. The 2ND STEWARDESS comes by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, can I help you with that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's no problem. He smiles at her and she smiles back. He closes the luggage compartment door and turns to the Stewardess.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long is this flight?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We land in Val Verde in exactly eleven hours.. She moves down the aisle. Matrix looks down at his digital watch and presses a button.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :00:00 appears on the watchface. Instantly, it starts counting down: 10:59:59, 10:59:58...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix starts down the aisle. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, during takeoff you must -- MATRIX (COVERING MOUTH) I'm airsick... He pushes by her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix moves to the service elevator, squeezes in, hits the controls and starts to descend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the elevator stops in the service area of the big plane. Matrix gets out of the elevator and looks out a port. The place is moving faster! He turns and moves to a door marked CARGO HOLD. It's locked. He PULLS, the door starts to bend, then the lock suddenly SNAPS. He opens the door and crawls inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The passengers sit unaware of anything unusual.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: -UP of the latch on the luggage compartment holding Henriques' body shows the latch imperceptively
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THE PLANE - DAY The plane leaves the terminal area and turns toward the runway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sully watches plane approach the runway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PILOT'S CABIN/CONTROL TOWER 72 INTERCUT the pilot talking with the control tower to clear the plane for takeoff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The plane begins to roll down the runway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix crawls through the crowded hold. Without looking, he starts to push a box out of the way and -- DOG CAGE 75 A doberman Pinscher SNARLS and FLASHES HIS TEETH right INTO the CAMERA. Matrix jerks his hand away from the dog cage just as the Pinscher's teeth push between the bars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The plane starts to taxi down the runway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The luggage compartment holding Henriques' body edges open and a small corner of the blanket comes out. The passengers sit unaware.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix has reached the area immediately above the plane's landing gear. The NOISE is deafening. He digs his hands under the lip of the gear retract equipment and LIFTS with all his might. Nothing moves for a beat, he continues to STRAIN MIGHTILY and the cowling starts to move! With a final grunt, he lifts it up and pushes it out of the way. The ground rushes beneath the airplane. Matrix swings his feet into the hole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PLANE - DAY 79 The plane takes off and ROARS into the sky, clearing the marshes at the end of the runway.
direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - "COMMANDO" - 4/24/85 41 INT. CAR - NIGHT 136-B X MATRIX I'm sorry I got you involved in this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then why won't you tell me what it's about. Matrix reaches into his pocket, pulls out his wallet, opens it and hands it to Cindy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's about her. Cindy looks at a photo tucked into a wallet, clear plastic photo insert.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a color photo of Jenny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 136-D X CINDY Is she the one that was kidnapped? Matrix nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some people are using her to force me to do a job. If I don't get to her soon, they'll kill her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you do the job?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I knew they'd kill her even if I did it. The only chance she has is if I get to her before they know what I'm doing. Cindy looks at the photo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is her mother -- Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - "COMMANDO" - 4/24/85 41-A 136-D Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She died when Jenny was born. I was in Laos when it happened, so I came home intending to raise her. (PAUSING) But on her third birthday I was in Lebanon. When she went to grade school, I was in Angola. When she had the measles, I was in Pakistan. And now she's been kidnapped because of me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why were you always travelling?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was on special assignment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean like in the Army or something?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did you do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Things you don't want to know about. Things I sometimes wish I didn't know about. He looks over at Cindy, then looks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That part of my life is over with. All that matters to me now is Jenny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix drives the car into a parking lot in front of a motel and parks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix looks out the window toward the motel. Then Matrix looks down at his watch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - "COMMANDO" - 4/24/85 41-B INSERT - WATCH 139 X 05:00 remains. It changes to 04:59:59 as we WATCH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix gets out of the car, closes the door and starts to move across the parking lot. He stops as he notices Cindy getting out of the car, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What're you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Helping you get her back. She closes the door and joins him. He looks at her for a beat, then they move toward the motel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They quietly and cautiously approach one of the motel rooms. The drapes are closed. Cindy stays a few feet back as Matrix, gun drawn, slowly EASES Sully's motel key into the door lock, then
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the door.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: IMMEDIATELY LOOK AT EACH OTHER AND FREEZE

direction.raw_text: Matrix, gun out in front, BURSTS into the room. No one's there. Cindy nervously peeks her head into the room, sees it's okay, joins Matrix inside, closes the door and locks the chain. They look around the room. Sully's suitcase is spilled open on one of the beds. Beer cans and fast food containers lay open and the bureau drawers are ajar. Matrix goes to the suitcase and searches through it. Cindy checks out the bureau drawers. Matrix finds nothing in the suitcase. He looks under the bed, then moves to the closet and looks inside. It's empty. There is a SUDDEN LOUD KNOCKING at the front door. Matrix and Cindy IMMEDIATELY LOOK AT EACH OTHER AND FREEZE. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - "COMMANDO" - 4/24/85 41-C 141 Cont. Then Matrix quietly moves to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispers, urgent) It's Cooke. Let him in... Matrix moves into the bathroom and turns on the shower. Cindy tears the covers off the bed, musses up her hair and unbuttons her blouse to show some cleavage. Matrix and Cindy edge up to the door and Matrix flattens himself aginst the wall close to the door. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont. He nods to Cindy and she opens the door a crack so the chain is still locking the door. Cooke, standing, outside, looks through the crack at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's Sully?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's in the shower. Cooke listens a beat to the running shower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who're you? Cindy looks him up and down, then slouches toward the crack so her breasts push at her blouse. She smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Room service... Cooke looks back through the door at her. Matrix, at the inside edge of the door,is holding_his gun, ready to fire. Matrix can only see Cindy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Open the door. Cindy unlocks the chain and opens the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Move out of the way. Cindy moves away from the door. Matrix tenses, ready to attack. Cooke looks into the room at the rumpled bed, suitcase and fast food containers. The shower SOUNDS continue to echo from the bathroom. Cooke cautiously enters the doorway. WHAM! Matrix SLAMS the gun against the brawny Cooke's head. Cooke crashes back against the wall, but doesn't go down. He grabs Matrix's gun hand by the wrist and the two of them STRUGGLE for the gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! BLAM! The gun FIRES into the ceiling as they wrestle around the room. They BREAK a table and CRASH into a chest of drawers. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont.I I Cindy moves to help Matrix. BLAM! The gun FIRES again,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the lamp near Cindy, making her duck for cover. Cooke slowly FORCES the gun toward Matrix's face. The barrel gets CLOSER... CLOSER... then almost points right at Matrix. With a sudden SURGE of power, Matrix lifts Cooke off the ground, pushes him toward the wall and the two of them CRASH RIGHT THROUGH THE DOOR into the adjoining room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A twenty-year-old couple in bed look up in shock as Matrix and Cooke bounce off their bed and SLAM against the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The gun FIRES, SHATTERING the mirror above the young couple and they SCRAMBLE to safety on the floor on the other side of the bed. Matrix and Cooke come off the wall and SLAM onto the floor, the gun coming out of Matrix's hand. Cooke picks it up before Matrix can reach it. Cooke points the gun right at Matrix's face, pulls back the trigger, then smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck you, asshole. He pulls the trigger. CLICK. No more bullets in the bun. The blood drains from Cooke's face. Matrix looks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck you, asshole... He BLASTS Cooke in the jaw and Cooke goes backward through the broken door and falls to the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix races back through the broken door, starts toward Cooke, then stops cold. Cooke has fallen on the broken, sharp table leg and the leg goes into his back and comes out of his chest. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont. Matrix bends down to the barely alive Cooke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is she, Cooke? Cooke looks blankly back at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cooke... Cooke!! Cooke's eyes go cold and still. He's dead. Cindy approaches and swallows as she looks down at his body, the stake coming out of his chest. Matrix starts emptying Cooke's pockets. There's a wallet containing only cash. Matrix tosses it to the floor. He brings out a lighter and a package of cigarettes, examines the lighter, then tosses both objects to the floor. He pulls out two keys on a key chain. They're car keys. Matrix leaps to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix and Cindy exit from the room and go out to the parking lot. Matrix looks at the six cars parked there, then he breaks a key off the chain and hands it to Cindy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Try the trunks. They split up. Matrix tries the car door key into a Pontiac. It won't open. Cindy goes to the trunk of a Honda. It won't open. Matrix races to a Ford. The door won't open. Cindy races to a Cadillac. She opens the trunk! Matrix races over to her and looks into the trunk. It's empty. He uses the door key and opens the Cadillac's door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix looks desperately around the inside of the Cadillac. Nothing. He opens the glove compartment and looks inside. Nothing. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont. He starts to come out of the car, then suddenly stops. He sees the edge of a piece of paper protruding from the pocket along the inside of the car door. He pulls the paper out and looks at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's an invoice from "Coastal Fuel, 110 Hermosa St., Long Beach, California, 90802" to "Patria Enterprises,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Redonda St., San Pedro, California, 90733."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix comes out of the car with the invoice and Cindy looks at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Make any sense to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Coastal is a fuel depot that supplies planes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For who -- the airlines?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, usually smaller, private aircraft.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You sure?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm getting my pilot's license. Coastal is where my instructor gets his fuel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a lot of warehouses around Redondo Street. Arius must be keeping a plane there. Matrix closes the car door and pockets the invoice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . WAREHOUSE - NIGHT Thirty guerilla soldiers are working in the same warehouse that Arius and Bennett had walked through earlier. Trucks, tanks, jeeps, bazookas, machine guns, mortars, etc. are spread around the darkened room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . WAREHOUSE - NIGHT Matrix removes a ground level, wire mesh grille from the warehouse's outside wall, then he crawls through and Cindy replaces the grille.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix crawls along the warehouse floor in the darkened room. He goes under a jeep, then pauses to survey the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The soldiers move weapons, metal containers and wooden crates from the trucks to the jeeps. A soldier's feet walk right in front of Matrix, the soldier unloads a crate onto the jeep above Matrix, then the feet move away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix crawls away from the jeeps, moves low through the shadows, goes into a corridor and sees a door ajar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A soldier, Vega, is looking at some charts on a table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix pushes open the door slightly to see into the rest of the room. As the door moves, it CREAKS on its hinge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vega looks up from the charts and sees the door is open more then it was. He pauses, then starts walking toward the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix starts to move away from the door, then stops. He hears FOOTSTEPS and CONVERSATION approaching the other end of the corridor. He's trapped!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vega is two feet away from the inside of the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix desperately grabs the door handle and pushes the door forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix SLAMS his fist into Vega's stomach, then quickly
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: into the room, puts a choke hold around Vega with his left arm, then carefully closes the door with his right. As soon as the door closes, the FOOTSTEPS and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: pass right by the door outside in the corridor. Matrix pulls Vega toward the back of the room, SMASHES his Adam's apple, opens a closet,,drops the dead Vega inside, then closes the door. He moves to the door leading outside the warehouse, opens it and Cindy enters. They begin to whisper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I saw all the equipment, but there's no plane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about your daughter? Matrix shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Arius and Bennett aren't here. She's wherever they are. Matrix looks at Cindy in desperation for a beat, then they begin to look around the room. The room is designed as the aircraft control room. There are aerial charts on the tables and the walls. There are photos of several military planes and a civilian amphibious plane. There are copies of weather reports situated around the room and there is a VHF radio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix notes a set of military map coordinates penciled onto the side of a chart. They read,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ; 8142-5938; 7565-5474. A "Scale line" is drawn under the coordinates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He studies the coordinates, then picks up a drafting compass and pen. He puts three dots, which corresponds to the three sets of coordinates onto a coasted chart of Southern California.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cindy is studying the photos of the aircraft.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix sets the width of the legs of the drafting compass, then puts the point of one of the compass legs onto one of the three dots and draws a circle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and CONVERSATION approach the door. Matrix stops drawing and freezes. Cindy looks toward the door. The FOOTSTEPS reach the door, then continue right by it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix uses the compass to draw a second circle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: of the pen as it finishes a third circle, the three circles now intersecting right over a small island 200 miles west of Los Angeles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix looks at the island, then shows the chart to Cindy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Something's going on out there. Cindy looks at the chart, then back at the photos of the aircraft on the wall. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One of these plane's an amphibian. Maybe they're using it to fly there. Matrix comes over and looks at the photo of the amphibian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me see that invoice. Matrix takes it out of his pocket, shows it to her and she studies it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She sees, "250 gallons of Type 4 aircraft fuel."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix and Cindy glance at each other as FOOTSTEPS go by outside. They continue to whisper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Type four fuel is amphibian and two hundred fifty gallons is what it would take to fly that plane to the island and back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But it's not here. I saw everything they've got. Cindy glances at the invoice, then looks up at Matrix.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was refueled at pump station thirty-two, Pacific Pier. That's San Pedro.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long's it take to fly out to the island? Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: About two hours. Matrix looks at his watch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The watch reads 02:56:15 and counting down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two soldiers, ROBERTO and Juan, come down the corridor They pass the room Matrix is in, then Roberto stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Momento... He comes back right toward Matrix's door. He turns the door handle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He goes into the room! Matrix and Cindy are flat against the wall, hiding behind the door, inches from Roberto.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vega? He looks around for a beat, then turns and leaves the room, closing the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix (carrying the chart) and Cindy move away from the warehouse and approach Sully's car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are we going to the plane?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not yet. She looks bewilderedly at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are we going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shopping.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAR - NIGHT 174 Matrix and Cindy are in Sully's car SPEEDING along a street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix is driving, his face HARD. Cindy glances over at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix and Cindy slowly drive by the front of a "Guns and Survival Equipment" store. It is heavily barricaded with a thick steel grille. They pass some street construction equipment (steamroller, caterpillar, forklift, flashing warning signs, etc.), and drive to the rear of the store. There's a heavy concrete wall with no windows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you get in? Matrix JERKS the car into reverse and RACES the car backwards around another building until the car is o. s.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The camera is in the store shooting out through the steel grille. We hear a RUMBLING NOISE and then we SEE IT. Matrix is atop a steamroller that is ROLLING right AT THE CAMERA. The steamroller CRASHES into the front of the store and the GLASS SHATTERS INWARD and the steel grille
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: under the roller. Matrix jumps off the steamroller as the alarm starts to
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . He takes a shopping cart (like in Safeway) and starts working the aisles. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont. Along the first aisle, he grabs a snorkel, mask and flippers and tosses them into the cart, then grabs a deflated and compressed rubber raft and paddle and tosses them in, too. He takes the cart and SHOVES it down the aisle, the cart coming to a rolling crash among the debris at the front of the store. Cindy takes the cart and quickly rolls it out of the store. Matrix moves to the next aisle, takes another shopping cart and moves down the aisle. He grabs O.D. fatigue pants, an assault-extraction survival vest, a camouflage sweater, black survival boots, and combat knives. He gives the cart a shove and it rolls crazily down the aisle into the debris. Cindy quickly rolls the cart outside. Matrix moves to the counter and starts feverisl-rly moving his hands along the underside looking for something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, come on... He suddenly feels the hidden button and presses it. Behind him, a wall containing innocuous sporting equipment slides to the side, revealing a hidden room. Matrix pushes a cart into the room. The store alarm continues to CLANG.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This room is loaded with every kind of illegal weapon imaginable. It's an AWESOME sight. Matrix garbs an Israeli Desert Eagle (Monster 44 automatic handgun), a 9mm. submachine gun, a 12 gauge assault shotgun with folding stock, a Steyr 223 assault rifle, a LAW rocket launcher, grenades, dynamite and fuse, bandoliers with ammo and loads everything into the cart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He wheels the cart out of the hidden room, moves down the aisle with it, then carefully pushes it so it rolls by itself the rest of the way to Cindy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get the car. Cindy catches the cart, glances inside and her
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . She wheels the cart away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix reenters the hidden room, sees if he's missing anything, is satisfied and leaves the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix passes by the counter and SUDDENLY A COP comes out from behind the aisle with his shotgun pointed right at Matrix's head. He COCKS the trigger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !! Matrix quickly looks toward the other direction to flee. A SECOND COP is at the end of the other aisle with his shotgun also pointed at Matrix's head. He COCKS the trigger. Trapped!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The police paddy wagon drives through the night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix is standing in the back of the paddy wagon, his face up against the small, wire mesh "window" that leads to the front seat where the two cops that arrested him, DARYL and FRED, are sitting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you'll call Kirby, he'll tell you!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Daryl looks over at Fred and rolls his eyes. Fred, who's driving, smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix gives up, leans exhaustedly against the paddy wagon wall, and looks at his watch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The watch reads 02:23:02 and counting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix LOOKS HOPELESSLY at his watch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The paddy wagon pulls up to a red light. To the side, Cindy ENTERS THE FRAME and drives the car up next to the wagon. The two cops glance over at her. Cindy smiles and winks at them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Daryl glances over at Fred.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hooker, not bad... The light turns green and Fred drives the wagon through the light. The wagon pulls ahead and Daryl looks into the outside, right rearview mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - NIGHT 190 Her car remains stationary at the light. She is standing next to the car waving to Daryl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Daryl looks over at Fred.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think she wants to give us something. Daryl looks back toward the rearview mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . STREET - NIGHT 192 A CLOSE SHOT of Cindy SHOWS her now with the LAW rocket launcher on her shoulder pointed at the paddy wagon. She pulls the trigger. BOOM!! A rocket SHOOTS out of the rear of the launcher and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a bus stop kiosk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-oh...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Daryl is staring incredulously into the rearview mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matrix, listening to the continuing explosion, reacts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cindy now has the launcher pointed correctly, and fires at the back tires of the wagon. BOOM!! The road underneath the back of the wagon EXPLODES and the back of the wagon is KNOCKED UPWARDS and the wagon
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to its side and SKIDS along the road. The wagon slows and stops, the smoke clears and we SEE a giant hole along the back and bottom of the wagon. Matrix dazedly exits from the wagon, Cindy SCREECHES up in the car, Matrix dives in the back and she RACES AWAY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Daryl and Fred, dazed but unhurt are trying to get out of the wagon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cindy and Matrix are speeding off into the night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where'd you learn to do that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: High' School.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ARIUS' ESTATE - NIGHT 198 Two heavily armed GUARDS patrol the perimeter wall of Arius' estate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Arius and Bennett are in the living room surrounded by ten guerrillas. They are looking at a map of Val Verde.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The border of the country has arrows drawn at different areas showing where the guerrillas will enter the country.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How soon does Matrix arrive in Val Verde? Bennett glances at his watch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just over two hours.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me know as soon as he lands. (PAUSING) You think he's going to give us any problems?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He'll do anything we tell him as long as he thinks he'll get his daughter back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: wonder if he knows he's never going to get her back. Arius and Bennett look at each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jenny moves to the door of her darkened room and tries the door handle. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont. It's tightly locked. She moves to a window and pulls at the boards over it. They don't move. She sits back down on the floor and begins to shiver.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAR - NIGHT Cindy and Matrix are in the car driving near the water in San Pedro.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAR - NIGHT Cindy is at the wheel, Matrix in the passenger seat. Cindy approaches a red light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't stop. She drives through the light, takes a sharp left and begins driving on a street along the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A police car, light FLASHING, turns onto the street up ahead, and begins RACING directly toward them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cindy glances at Matrix; he's watching the police car. The police car gets CLOSER and CLOSER to them as they continue to watch, then the police SPEED right past them, and FADE AWAY behind them. Cindy exhales her breath and glances at Matrix. He watches as the police disappear, then he turns and stares straight ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: an old, beat-up Grauman Goose seaplane, then we
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cindy and Matrix parked near it. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont. They are at a deserted pier in San Pedro. Matrix looks at a lighted shack nearby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A guerrilla GUARD is in the small shack reading an aircraft manual. His feet are on the edge of the desk and he casually pushes his chair to tilt backwards. Matrix silently enters the shack and looks around. The guard's back is to Matrix.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The guard is TILTING his chair back and forth; Matrix is standing right behind him. The guard tilts his chair backward, Matrix circles his forearm around the man's neck and SLAMS him backward OUT OF FRAME to the floor. With his left hand, Matrix takes a ring of keys off of the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cindy, the inflatable raft at her feet, is waiting at the plane as Matrix, carrying two duffel bags of equipment, approaches her. She takes the key ring from him, opens the door of the plane and Matrix begins to load the duffel bags inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cindy sits in the pilot's seat and stares at the controls as Matrix gets in the passenger seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This isn't a plane... it's a canoe with wings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Start paddling. Cant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont. She plays with some controls and an engine starts to
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . She tries the other engine. It COUGHS and dies. She tries the engine again. It starts to turn over, then COUGHS and dies again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, you piece of shit! He SLAMS his hand onto the control panel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The engine STARTS UP!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - NIGHT 212 MATRIX Works every time... Cindy REVS the engines and starts to move the plane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A second guerrilla GUARD is RACING his jeep toward the plane. He FIRES with a pistol.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! BLAM! Bullets BLAST holes into the side of the plane.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - 215 BLAM! BLAM! Bullets SMASH into the cockpit near Matrix and Cindy. Matrix lifts his submachine gun and FIRES it. BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM!
direction.name: direction
